snippet: The popularity of banda music, in which the tuba plays a dominant role, is seen by some as the cause of a recent rash of thefts.
abstract: String of tuba thefts from music departments in Southern California appear to be motivated by the growing popularity of banda, a traditional Mexican music form in which tubas play a dominant role; teachers point to the targeted pattern of the burglaries; the expensive brass tubas and sousaphones, which cost $2,000 to $7,000, are pilfered, while electronics, cheaper fiberglass tubas and other brass instruments are usually left behind.
lead_paragraph: The popularity of banda music, in which the tuba plays a dominant role, is seen by some as the cause of a recent rash of thefts.
